main event: On July 15, 1965, witnesses in Sweet Home, Oregon observed a mysterious glowing object resembling a bright star, which was observed for 45 minutes.
interesting points: The object was compared in size to Venus and was described as a very bright light,It showed erratic movements and did not leave a contrail,Experts later concluded it was likely a satellite (ECHO I),Multiple observers described similar characteristics and behaviors of the object,The observation lasted longer than typical sightings noted in the area.
sighted object: A glowing object resembling a bright star
witness description: Civilian observers, including a teenage astronomy study group and air traffic control personnel.
